en.description: Melee Arcane that grants bonus Melee Damage for every 200 current Shields, up to a maximum 420% bonus at all arcane ranks. This Bonus is halved for Overshields.

ru.description: 30% к урону в ближнем бою за каждый 200 текущий щит, вплоть до 420%. Бонус для сверхщитов уменьшен вдвое.

ko.description: Melee Arcane that grants bonus Melee Damage for every 200 current Shields, up to a maximum 420% bonus at all arcane ranks. This Bonus is halved for Overshields.

de.description: Melee Arcane that grants bonus Melee Damage for every 200 current Shields, up to a maximum 420% bonus at all arcane ranks. This Bonus is halved for Overshields.

pt.description: Melee Arcane that grants bonus Melee Damage for every 200 current Shields, up to a maximum 420% bonus at all arcane ranks. This Bonus is halved for Overshields.

zh-hans.description: 当前每拥有 200 护盾，获得 30% 近战伤害，最多获得 420% 近战伤害。通过过载护盾获得的增益减半。

zh-hant.description: Melee Arcane that grants bonus Melee Damage for every 200 current Shields, up to a maximum 420% bonus at all arcane ranks. This Bonus is halved for Overshields.

uk.description: Дає 30% до шкоди холодною зброєю за кожні 200 від щитів, накопичується до 420%. Для надщитів бонус удвічі менший.
